properties.name: Dehoo manganese deposit, Dehoo, Zahedan County, Sistan and Baluchestan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Dehoo manganese deposit, Dehoo, Zahedan County, Sistan and Baluchestan Province, Iran

Location: Iran

A predominantly submarine hydrothermal Mn deposit complemented by terrigenous detrital mafic material. Situated in the central part of the Iranian Flysch Zone. Located 52 km to the south-southwest of Zahedan and 7 km to the southeast of Dehoo.

View on Mindat.org

properties.name: Cheshmeh Esi Fe deposit, Khorrambid County, Fars Province, Iran
properties.description:
Cheshmeh Esi Fe deposit, Khorrambid County, Fars Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

Iron oxide mineralization occurs in the form of small lenses and layers in Triassic–Jurassic dolomites and schists, ranging from 10 to 50 m in length and 2 to 4 m in thickness. The ore body outcrops with a northeast–southwest trend and a dip of approxi...

properties.name: Kuh-e-Chehr Mn deposit, Zarrin Rural District, Kharanaq District, Ardakan County, Yazd Province, Iran
properties.description:
Kuh-e-Chehr Mn deposit, Zarrin Rural District, Kharanaq District, Ardakan County, Yazd Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

The manganese deposit of Kuh-e-Chehr, northeast of Ardakan, in the Yazd block, consists of the main minerals pyrolusite, cryptomelane, manganosite, limonite, and goethite. The high ratio of Si/Al, Mn/Fe, enrichment of Pb, Sr, Ba, Zn, and depletion of C...
